title: Tutorial 4- Stemming And Lemmatization And Its Implementation NLP_Krish NAik(1)
text: and yes, please watch the video till the end. So let's first of all see the definition of stemming and then we will move on to practical implementation. So stemming is the process of reducing a word to its word stem. Here this word is very important, word stem, always remember this. One more thing is word root.

title: Tutorial 4- Stemming And Lemmatization And Its Implementation NLP_Krish NAik(1)
text: So we will see the differences between the two. So stemming is the process of reducing a word to its word stem that affixes to suffixes and prefixes or to the roots of the word known as lemma. Stemming is important in natural language understanding and even it is used in natural language processing. So in this much definition, you just have to remember that we will try to find out the base form of the words, their word stem. So if we want to know the definition of stemming, we have to find out the base form of the words, their word stem.
